column1: Zepto delivery is insanely fast! 10 mins literally.
The vegetables were not fresh, very disappointed.
Love the app interface, so smooth.
Delivery partner was rude and asked for extra tip.
My order was cancelled without reason. Worst experience.
Packaging was torn and milk spilled all over.
Why is there no refund yet? It's been 3 days.
Items missing from my bag, please check.
